attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children upto the age of 16, should be off the streets by 10.30pm. 

Children that are found on the streets after 10.30pm should be taken into costody and questioned carefully by the police, who would then inform their parents, to make sure they are aware of their childrens movements.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
